callEmployer: Call the Employment Tribunal customer contact centre if you have any questions about the case. They cannot give you legal advice or process any updates to the case.
contactLink: contact the tribunal about the case.
hours:
Monday to Thursday, 8.30am to 5pm.
Friday, 8.30am to 4pm.
The centre does not open on bank holidays.
callCharges: Find out about call charges (opens in new tab)
